channel.title: Native GNU/Linux Linux programs for you android
channel.description: http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1444792 opens some possibilities up so thought i would share.

item.title: Native GNU/Linux Linux programs for you android
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

This was always possible and done of course, all the OpenVPN apps for example are just front-ends for native binaries, but it does look nice to have a script. Neat.

edit:
Oooh, rsync, finally a decent way to backup my phone without copying everything over slow wifi or slow usb.

Read full topic
item.source: Native GNU/Linux Linux programs for you android
